content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SSSTRESC
      operator: does_not_use_valid_codelist_terms
      value: DEAD
      value_is_literal: true
    - name: $ds_dsdecod
      operator: does_not_contain
      value: DEATH
      value_is_literal: true
Operations:
  - operator: distinct
    domain: DS
    name: DSDECOD
    id: $ds_dsdecod
    group:
      - USUBJID
Core:
  Id: FDA.SDTMIG.CT2001
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Variable must be populated with terms from its CDISC controlled terminology
  codelist. New terms cannot be added into non-extensible codelists.
Outcome:
  Message: Variable value not found in non-extensible codelist.
  Output Variables:
    - 
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: FDA
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2 '
        References:
          - Origin: FDA Business Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: FDAB017
              Version: '1'
            Version: '1.5'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Variable must be populated with terms from its CDISC controlled terminology codelist. New terms cannot be added into non-extensible codelists.

Outcome.Message: Variable value not found in non-extensible codelist.
